item.title: What exactly is system design?
item.description: System Design is the process of identifying and defining the various components of the system, their relationships, and the data flow. When building a product or a feature there is no prize for guessing what happens if an individual or team entirely skips the design process or only design at a high level. Sooner or later, they will have to get back to the drawing board and design it again!
